name: Slime Roguelike
description:
WASD for movement
Space + direction to dash
Arrow keys to shoot
Q/E to cycle through the inventory
R to throw selected items
The character has to pick up the bullets he shoots to shoot again.
The amount of bullets you have depends on how many items you hold. 1 new item = 1 less bullet(Same items stack)
There are items spread around that buff the character. You get a description for each item you find if you get close.

The game has no end and you can keep playing to see how strong you can get

This is a game I've been working on for a while. I wanted to use this as a learning opportunity, but eventually, I got ideas for new projects and I stopped learning from this one, so I decided to put it on indefinite hold and move on.
